rows.label: bf11500150_0060
rows.name: You there, were you Ornella-san's Blade?

rows.label: bf11500150_0080
rows.name: You are! From the Imperial Guard!

rows.label: bf11500150_0100
rows.name:
How nostalgic... At that time, I was
still just a child about this big...

rows.label: bf11500150_0110
rows.name:
I really looked up to you, with
that longsword on your back.

rows.label: bf11500150_0120
rows.name:
If you hadn't shown up, this
village would have been...

rows.label: bf11500150_0135
rows.name:
The house where you lived is still
there, on the edge of the village.

rows.label: bf11500150_0170
rows.name: Wow, this place is really run-down.

rows.label: bf11500150_0175
rows.name:
I heard it's been around
90 years, but still...

rows.label: bf11500150_0180
rows.name:
What's wrong? Did you find something
that brought back memories?

rows.label: bf11500150_0200
rows.name:
I see... that's a shame. I wanted
to know the "you" from before.

rows.label: bf11500150_0210
rows.name: I... am me. I am always the same.

rows.label: bf11500150_0230
rows.name: Laura! What happened? Are you okay?

rows.label: bf11500150_0240
rows.name: Ah... that hit me right in the heart.

rows.label: bf11500150_0270
rows.name: That line just now was perfect!

rows.label: bf11500150_0290
rows.name:
You don't even realize it, do you? Sometimes, you
say things that just hit me right in the heart.

rows.label: bf11500150_0330
rows.name:
I bet you were just
like this before, too.

rows.label: bf11500150_0350
rows.name:
She looks so happy.
That's a great smile.

rows.label: bf11500150_0380
rows.name:
She must be, to be able to
smile like that next to you.

rows.label: bf11500150_0400
rows.name: I've got it! Let's take a photo.
